articles.author: Stephen Luntz
articles.title: Meet The Giant Armored Fossil Skink Twice As Big As Largest Surviving Species - IFLScience
articles.description: Fifty thousand years ago in Australia, even the skinks were chonky.
articles.content: A newly described species of skink was 1,000 times heavier than the typical member of that family. The largest known skink went extinct 47,000 years ago, at the same time as many other Australian gia… [+3542 chars]
